welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bridgeview, where the clear blue skies and charming streets await you. Known for its lively atmosphere and diverse culture, we invite you to explore our city and experience all it has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights and is home to Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights and is home to Volaris and Porter Airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport with no time limit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines, Air Canada, and more.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines, Alaska Airlines, and more.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Serves international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport handles all commercial flights and provides various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to handling cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dupage County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.
